scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:manual
scripts.build:manual: pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-core run build && sleep 2 && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-devtools run build && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-dict-reloader run build && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-jp run build && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-us run build && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-network run build && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-security run build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-core run typecheck && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-devtools run typecheck && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-dict-reloader run typecheck && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-jp run typecheck && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-us run typecheck && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-network run typecheck && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-security run typecheck
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-core run test && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-devtools run --if-present test && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-dict-reloader run --if-present test && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-jp run --if-present test && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-us run --if-present test && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-network run --if-present test && pnpm --filter @himorishige/noren-plugin-security run --if-present test
